properties.areaDesc: Inland Miami-Dade County; Metropolitan Miami Dade; Coastal Miami Dade County; Metro Broward County
properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 1 at 12:19AM EST by NWS Miami FL
properties.description:
* At 1219 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm
over Miccosukee Resort, or 10 miles northwest of Kendall, moving
northeast at 15 mph.

* Winds in excess of 45 mph possible with this storm.

* Locations impacted include...
Miami, Hialeah, Miramar, Coral Gables, South Miami, Kendall, Doral,
Miami Lakes, Hialeah Gardens, Miami Springs, Sweetwater, West
Miami, Medley, Westchester, Fountainbleau, Kendale Lakes, Palm
Springs North, Pennsuco, The Hammocks and Downtown Miami.
properties.instruction:
These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around
unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the
storm passes.

To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement
agency. You can also share your report with NWS Miami on Facebook and
Twitter.

NWSheadline: SIGNIFICANT WEATHER ADVISORY FOR NORTHERN MIAMI-DADE COUNTY UNTIL 100 AM EST
